snippet.title: Light Nite  - Trailer November 2021
snippet.description:
Light Nite is a play to earn game where you can win bitcoin or NFTs by playing. Fight alone or with your squad in the Battle Royale or Team Deathmatch modes!

Light ⚡ Nite is a TPS battle royale game developed by Satoshi's Games. Early Access it's available at the moment in the Elixir Game Launcher. Find more information here: https://lightnite.io

How to earn bitcoin in Light Nite Early Access?
https://blog.lightnite.io/play2earn/

Light Nite has different collaborations with different companies int he cryptocurrency world like Binance, Trezor, Strike, Bluewallet, Bitrefill...

Join our Discord server and ask our community!
https://discord.gg/S6ttDxj
